strings.title: Game Of Estimates
strings.summary: Online Planning Poker (also known as Scrum Poker)
strings.description:
Quickly create a room and send the link to participants.

  • No registration required
  • No ads
  • Free without limitations
  • Open Source
  • Your privacy is respected
